findings.title: Upgradeability Errors
findings.description: CircleBridgeAdapter.sol is not initializing Router.

findings.title: Data Inconsistency
findings.description: Failed calls on remote chain are not reported back to origin chain.

findings.title: Compilation Error
findings.description: Create2Factory contract implements custom errors, but pragma version is ^0.8.0.

findings.title: Missing SafeERC20
findings.description: Project does not implement SafeERC20 for ERC20 transfers.

findings.title: Best Practice Violation
findings.description: Functions do not use SafeTransferFrom() or SafeMint() functions.

findings.title: Unfinalized code
findings.description: Code contains multiple TODO comments about functionalities yet to be implemented.

findings.title: Copy of well-known contract
findings.description: Project uses a merged version of OpenZeppelinâ€™s ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable and PausableUpgradeable contracts.

findings.title: Data Consistency
findings.description: hyperlaneDomainToCircleDomain mapping can be ambiguous.

findings.title: Best Practices
findings.description: CircleBridgeAdapter.sendTokens() performs an inefficient check on _destinationDomain.

findings.title: Upgradeability Errors
findings.description: In InterchainAccountRouter.sol, constructor is combined with initialize function.

findings.title: Inefficient Gas Model
findings.description: Length computation for arrays is often included in the loop condition instead of a local variable.

findings.title: Unemitted Events
findings.description: Contracts do not emit events on send and receive situations
findings.location: InterchainAccountRouter, LiquidityLayerRouter contracts; _transferFromSender(), _transferTo() functions in HypERC20Collateral and HypeERC721Collateral contracts

findings.title: Function Visibility
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas
findings.location: latestCheckpoint(), verify(), initialize(), getInterchainAccount() functions in various contracts

findings.title: Boolean Equality
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: The project uses floating pragmas

findings.title: Outdated Solidity Version
findings.description: Using an outdated compiler version can be problematic

findings.title: Misleading Require Message
findings.description: Some messages in the require conditions are not descriptive

findings.title: Empty Constructor
findings.description: In contract MultisigIsm, the constructor is empty and redundant

findings.title: Missing zero address validation
findings.description: Address parameters are used without checking against the possibility of 0x0
findings.location: _setMailbox(), setInterchainSecurityModule() functions in HyperlaneConnectionClient.sol; proxyCallBatch() function in OwnableMulticall.sol

findings.title: Style Guide Violation
findings.description: The provided projects should follow official guidelines
